description: Cloud Hopper - The Perfect Time Waster for webOS. ***"best money I’ve spent on an app...I’ve recommended this game to every webOS user" - webOSroundup Top Pick | Rated a 5/5 "The game controls brilliantly, really very smooth, as good as (whisper it) Doodle Jump..."-MobiObie*** Upgrade to the full version for more heights and more characters! |Over 1 million games played! This game has more features than any other platform-jumper game on any mobile platform! This see-through game is the perfect addition to your wallpaper. With the transparent background you can always have a new playing experience just by changing your wallpaper and when you need a break from exploring new heights it disappears into the background waiting to be picked back up again. Cloud Hopper plays for endless hours of tilting, addicting fun in which you can compete with people globally on the daily, weekly, and all time leader boards or challenge yourself with personal achievements to unlock and view detailed statistics. With Twitter (oAuth security) and Facebook support it's easy to show off your high scores! Numerous preferences allow for a more personal experience such as the calibration option, which allows Cloud Hopper to keep you entertained at any angle. Now featuring a in-game STORE where you can buy/upgrade characters, wallpapers, t-shirts and more! This game is constantly being updated! Make Cloud Hopper a part of your wallpaper today!
